basicInfo.parentCompany: Privately held (employee-owned, founded by Sunil Saxena and Todd Robinson)
basicInfo.notes: Founded in 2001, employee-owned company. Co-founders Sunil Saxena and Todd Robinson still lead the company. HQ in Virginia Beach, VA with offices in California. 267 employees across 5 continents. Serves 170,000+ customers. Owns and operates own servers in data centers in California, Virginia, Netherlands, and Singapore. Known for US-based support and 90-day money-back guarantee.

pricing.moneyBackExclusions: Month-to-month VPS/Dedicated plans only get 30 days; Domain registrations non-refundable; SSL certificates non-refundable; Add-on services non-refundable

policiesOverages.bandwidthOveragePolicy: Unlimited within fair use; excessive use may require upgrade
policiesOverages.storageOveragePolicy: Hard limits apply; must upgrade plan
policiesOverages.accountSuspensionPolicy: AUP violations may result in content deletion, suspension, or termination; InMotion reserves right to delete material deemed inappropriate
policiesOverages.resourceAbuseDefinition: Exceeding inode limits (50,000); storing non-website files; excessive CPU/memory usage affecting other users
policiesOverages.hiddenFeesNotes: Renewal prices ~5x higher than promo ($2.62 → $12.49); Domain renewal $19.99/yr after free year; Automated backups only on higher-priced plans; Phone support limited to business hours (live chat/ticket 24/7); Month-to-month VPS/Dedicated only get 30-day refund

business.affiliateCommissionAmount: Tiered commission based on hosting product and sales volume; 90-day cookie duration

editorial.knownIssues: Renewal prices ~5x higher than promo ($2.62 → $12.49); Phone support limited to business hours (9AM-9PM ET M-F); Automated backups only on higher plans; Low inode limit (50,000) compared to competitors; 21% of Trustpilot reviews are 1-star; Domain renewal $19.99/yr is higher than competitors; Month-to-month VPS/dedicated only get 30-day refund
editorial.bestFor: Business users needing US-based support; Users wanting 90-day money-back guarantee; WordPress users (optimized with staging); cPanel users; Users needing 4 global data center locations; Users wanting employee-owned company
editorial.avoidIf: Budget-conscious at renewal time (5x markup); Need 24/7 phone support; Need low inode limits; Adult or adult-adjacent content; Need cheap monthly VPS plans
editorial.competitorComparisonNotes: 90-day money-back (longer than 30-45 day competitors); US-based support (unlike offshore competitors); 4 data centers including EU and Asia (better than HostGator's 2); Employee-owned like DreamHost; cPanel included (unlike Hostinger); Higher renewal markup than DreamHost (5x vs 2.7x); Lower Trustpilot (4.1) than SiteGround (4.8)/DreamHost (4.7); 99.99% uptime guarantee matches premium hosts; Staging included on WordPress plans

comparisonData.uniqueSellingPoint: Employee-owned US host with 90-day money-back, US-based support, and 99.99% uptime
comparisonData.idealCustomerProfile: US business wanting American support, long refund period, and BBB A+ rated company

faqContent.faqIsThisHostGood: InMotion is excellent for US businesses wanting American support and a BBB A+ rating, but has a 5x renewal markup and limited phone support hours.
faqContent.faqWhoOwnsThisHost: InMotion Hosting is employee-owned, founded in 2001 by Sunil Saxena and Todd Robinson who still lead the company.
faqContent.faqHowMuchDoesItCost: InMotion shared hosting starts at $2.62/month (promo) and renews at $12.49/month. First year costs approximately $31.
faqContent.faqIsItBeginnerFriendly: Yes, InMotion offers cPanel, US-based support, and good documentation. The 90-day money-back guarantee reduces risk for beginners.
faqContent.faqDoesItIncludeEmail: Yes, InMotion includes unlimited email accounts with shared hosting plans.
faqContent.faqCanIHostWordPress: Yes, InMotion offers WordPress hosting with staging, auto-updates, and BoldGrid website builder.
faqContent.faqWhatsTheUptime: InMotion guarantees 99.99% uptime, matching premium hosts, with SLA credits for downtime.
faqContent.faqCanICancelAnytime: Yes, with a 90-day money-back guarantee (longest in the industry). VPS/dedicated monthly plans only get 30 days.
